description: Demonstrates voice transcription capabilities - transcribe an audio file and analyze its content

inputs_schema.audio_file: Path to audio file to transcribe (mp3, wav, webm, etc.)

phases.name: transcribe
phases.instructions:
Transcribe the audio file at: {{ input.audio_file }}

Use the transcribe_audio tool to convert the speech to text. If the file is not found, report the error.

phases.name: analyze
phases.instructions:
Analyze the transcription from the previous phase.

Transcription result:
{{ outputs.transcribe }}

Provide a summary of:
1. Main topics discussed
2. Key points or takeaways
3. Sentiment/tone of the speaker
4. Any action items mentioned
